message.body: how about williams interveiwing with the Cowboys
yeah
fuck
i hope he doesnt go there
which means i hope Dom Capers takes the position
is he being interviews as well?
he was already offered the job there
but hasnt turned it down or accepted yet
hmmm
who knows
i dont even know what i want anymore
i bet the hire fassel
and i will be pissed
but what the fuck do i know
haha
big game for cuse tomorrow
yeah
HUGE game last saturday too
It was awesome
and nova keeps losing
because we just rolled in the second half
so great
yeah we did
i fucking hate them
that was what their 4th loss?
yeah
suckers
i hope you talked lots of shit
not too much, it was just Kristen beth tom and I
and beth and tom are beth and tom
so basically I was just with Kristen
what are beth and tom like
I don't know.
Just Beth and Tom
makes sense
have you ever really met tom?
yes a bunch of times
doesn't really have a personality
although for the past year i keep hearing that she is going to break up with him
yeah he is quiet
yeah and she sent an email to Kristen and I on friday something like this...
"if we could not talk about NC tomorrow at the game that would be great, as you noticed I only responded that "I" would be coming to NC"
basically that she is going to break up with him soon
but she ALWAYS says that
and then...
of course
how is your love life going
he will be there
i will put money on it
my love life is going well
things with amanda are still nice
probably will be living together by NC
where
what is nicky going to do?
he might stay at my parents place
or move in with Sammy if she moves back home
you guys going to find a place or move in with her
this is July ... so lots could still happen
we would find a place
i couldnt live there in a studio
yeah
have you guys talked about it much or are you just kind of guessing
no we have talked about
it
a lot
cool
the "plan" is to live in DC for another year together.
that was (and still is) a big adjustment for me
if that goes well then move to NYC for about two years
and then decide where to settle
yeah i am sure living together will be a HUGE adjustment
that will be awesome with you in NYC
well its at least 18 months away
so dont get too excited
haha
and lots of things need to go smoothly
but thats the plan
when does the ring come into the picture? you holding off for a little while
yeah i think
i mean i am saving
because who knows
but def not till i know where i am going to be.
i mean with that plan its hard to get married knowing that big changes are seemingly always right around the corner
if we were going to stay in DC then i would say i was a lot closer
why would it be hard to get married if you guys are thinking about going to NYC??
you guys would be doing this all together?
but i have no idea if i am going to be able to handle NYC
true
and she might not want to come back to DC if i hate it there
i know that doesnt make a lot of sense
you think she would choose the city over you? I doubt that
but pretty much no matter what happens there are going to be some sacrifices
I mean totally cool either way
no i dont think she would choose anything over me
and i wouldnt do either
which is why the situation is blurry
no need to rush into marriage just curious
like would i live somewhere i hate to make her happy
probably
and she would do the same
but do we want it to be that way...not really
be right back
k
yo yo
what up
how did you finally get K Life to give up her Dubois dreams?
I don't know if she ever thought that was a reality
better question would be how did she get me from giving up my philadelphia dreams
yeah i guess NYC and Dubois are a bit different
downtown
which comes up now and then
you wanted to live downtown?
why didnt you all?
Yeah I was all about living downtown for a year than buying
she said no?
well the place you got would warrant a move out of the city
it seems pretty awesome
yeah, I REALLY wanted to move but is something I realized I needed to sacrafice
I was OK with
but she has a hard time with that - almost like she thinks you should never have to sacrafice we should both just want the same things
hahaha
Friday night we went out to dinner with scott and ingy and then we stayed at scotts place
how was that
than sat morn we just woke up and grabbed the subway to go to the game
and I made a comment (completely innocently) isn't this great just being able to wake up and grab the subway to the game
yeah?
and then she is all you are never going to be able to forgive me for not letting you live in the city
and all that crap
oh boy
and I was like I will always want to live the city
that will never change
actually this happned after the game I wanted to stay downtown and chill and she was ready to head back home
well i think she should just be grateful that you gave that up for her
but I was just like I will always want to live downtown somewhere - I love it downtown - but that is something I was willing to sacrafice
yeah
not a big deal at all but she doesn't see it the same way exactly
yeah i know what you mean
but that is Kristen
and plus you both usually see things very similarly
its probably hard for her not to understand your feelings
you know?
yep
but other than that how is married life
and life with furniture
furn is great - we got the dining room table put up on Sunday
real dark wood - pub style table
that is awesome
yeah I really like it
good
you guys stll rocking two cars?
of course
what you think we are just goin to have one?
i dont know if it was possible
like sell one get some cash
that would drive me crazy
FREEDOM
yeah i mean i understand
i was just curious
no but I want a truck BAD
you just got your car!
I know but just because it was such a good deal
we may sell kristens car, she will take mine
and then I get a truck
interesting
how is all that stuff
like sharing finances and everything
and having to run decisions past her
different
although to be honest we both live below our means pretty well so it isn't too bad
that is smart
we are lucky in that regard to have pretty good jobs and bought the house well within our range
do you have joint everything?
no real debt
yeah getting a nice house at that cost is HUGE
not yet but we are in the process of joining everything
i couldnt even sniff a house that is that nice in this area
yeah that could have really put a strain on things
no joke
do you guys ever consider just living off of one of your alls salary and banking the rest?
like dont you think you could do that relatively easily?
yeah
we may be doing that
we are saving a lot but we should really do that
i mean i just think about how much you could save that way
because it is going to be a shock when we have kids and she stops working because she had a nice salary
exactly
I don't like to think about that
luckily i think when i have kids I am going to be the one to stop working
but you guys will still have to make up for your salary
not make up but adjust
yeah i will do Freelance
true
and be able to work from home
that is clutch'
and write off part of my place as an Office.
I wish Kristen could work part time or something
etc etc
she should run a day care out of your home
have a couple other parents pay her to watch the kids
I ran that by here but I said if we did that it woud NOT be in our home
hahhaa
my parents had like three kids to my house when i was young
it wasnt awful
because our Opeire (spelling?) cleaned when we napped
yeah, I just don't want to feel like I am coming home to a day care every night
selfishly
yeah i mean if the kids are gone by the time you get home then you are money
but i bet that would be really annoying for Kristen
i cant imagine doing that
and i LOVE kids
very true
I really want to start my own business but I don't know what
Design Agency with me
hahaha
sounds good
thats what i want to do after my kids go to school
use my freelance business and expand to maybe hire a few peeps
and go after some bigger clients
new mock draft
where?
espn
yeah

no way the hawks take a DT this year
how come?
if you end up with Mendenhall you will be set though
maybe he will fall
he is an absolute BEAST
by the way
also a beat. Falco
I don't know much about mendenhall
I would rather have stewart I think
He is MASSIVE
and fast
i saw the like Pro Day competition for Seniors this past wekeend
yeah but he has only really done it for 1 year
and he was in the spread offense
Mendenhall makes everyone else look like bitches
he has good hands
is as big as Jacobs in terms of bulk
and is probably faster
who is falco?
Flacco
sorry
from Delaware
oh yeah
he is huge... pretty fast ... and a RIFLE
dude threw it 74 yards with like no effort
mendenhall is only 5"11
yeah i guess he isnt that big in stature
but i am telling you he is built like a Mack Truck
you saw him this weekend in something?
pro day?
i dont know if its called pro day
but its like that competition that is like an all star competition
with obstacle courses etc
and scouts go
but it isnt like a Pro Day or Combine
its like what they do at the Pro Bowl in the NFL
oh yeah I saw it on TV sat but couldnt watch it
he ripped it up there?
well...
Mike Hart ripped it up
but Mendenhall was pretty impressive
and Flacco won the long distance and the obstacle course
by a lot in both
yeah he is going to do well in the combine I think
I can't wait for the combine down there
I love the NFL
and when he was doing the course the announcers were like "he is soooo slow becuase he is tall and the he beat everyone by like a full second"
haha
and he seems very confident
i bet he will start in the league next ear
year
what round do you project?
what pick
if he is a high second round pick he could go to falcons or something like that
if they go in a different direction in the first
hmmm
i am not sure
i wouldnt be surprised if the 9ers take him at 29
but that depends on how they are feeling about Smith
good point
maybe the ravens in the second
ravens are rumored to be interested in McNabb
I would love to see him moved
yeah me too
then we can totally hate the eagles
personally i think the Vikings should draft Flacco
and move Jackson to WR
hahahah
do you agree with me that Andre Woodson has bust written all over him?
http://insider.espn.go.com/nfl/draft08/insider/news/story?id=3207180
they say second round but he is going to impress some people at the combine and i bet will make a splash
maybe early in the Second
If the hawks are able to get a RB and TE in the draft and Tubbs get back to health in the offseason I think the Hawks will be Legit
and sign a G
like alan faneca
yeah thats a lot of ifs
but you guys should be fine
your division sucks balls
so pencil you in for another Playoff trip
not really though - I am sure we will get one of the top 3 TE's which could all start and be better than anything we currently have
yeah but RBs can be very hit or miss
not as much as Qbs
QBs
and if we want a RB I am sure we can pick from one of the top 5 which would be servicable
RB are pretty quick transistions
not always
the G would be the biggest IF
yeah
i was mostly referring to Faneca
because i bet lots of people will be after him
and you guys arent always the biggest spenders
yeah but we are at the same time
kearney
huge contract
we offered deihlman the largest contract
yeah i thought about that when i was saying it
but he stayed in SD
yea
Allen is so rich it is stupid
and he has a private 747 to wine and dine
yeah
yeah so does snyder
well i dont know if its a 747
but
i also am aware Allen has lots more money than that
but i mean other than when they play us i dont mind the hawks
so i am not going to talk shit
especially since the skins dont even have a coach right now
but i am happy about Zorn
that one hurts
I like him a lot
i like him too
but without a coach i mean it doesnt mean a lot
i kinda hope we hire Meeks
or Spagnuolo
but i dont think Snyder has the balls to hire someone who has no HC credentials
I think Fassel will do a good job
and he wont hire anyone who has HC credentials but hasnt won anything
so he is going to consistenly hire people like Fassel
you think?
how come?
i just dont remember anything but the bad times

made kerry collins look like a stud
yeah
was NFL coach of the year I think

he also got fired from the Ravens
who SUCKED
and that was just as an OC

offensively
true
but you know what i mean
he was the "fall guy"
you can see my concern
for Billick
i hope you are right
Yeah but he is a proven HC
with Post season experience
becaus it looks like we are going to hire him
yeah
he has been fired and probably learned from it
i wish we hadnt fucked things up with Schottenheimer
i wouldnt mind him either
true
everyone has been down on Snyder but i kinda like he is doing his due diligence
and got good coordinators because THAT is when they were available
I agree
if he had waited till now for Coordinators he would have a much smaller pool
and less talent
true
I agree
Zorn was the right hire
Blache keeps the defense consistent
which we need
cause they had a great year
and he has coached up some serious lack of talent on the DL
so that gives me faith in his skills
the only reason it would b ea bad thing is if the coach did not feel he had "his" staff
yah
but from everything I have heard zorn was his pick

us

He is my dark horse
